document_title: Parotid salivary gland tumor: Causes, signs and treatment
subsection_content:
According to Dr. Thuy Hang, the cause of parotid gland tumors is currently unknown, however there are risk factors for the appearance of parotid gland tumors in particular or salivary gland tumors in general such as genetic changes and exposure. with radiation, smoking.
Smoking is believed to be one of the main factors causing parotid tumors
